welcome.title: Welcome to Deyond Wallet
welcome.subtitle: Your secure gateway to the decentralized world

createWallet.title: Create Password
createWallet.subtitle: This password will encrypt your wallet on this device

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

displayMnemonic.title: Recovery Phrase
displayMnemonic.subtitle: Write down these 12 words in order and store them safely
displayMnemonic.warningText: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone. Anyone with these words can access your funds.
displayMnemonic.tip1: Write it down on paper and store in a secure location
displayMnemonic.tip2: Never store it digitally (screenshots, cloud, etc.)
displayMnemonic.tip3: Make multiple copies and store in different safe places

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify Recovery Phrase
verifyMnemonic.subtitle: Select the correct words in order to verify you've written down your recovery phrase

errors.incorrect: Incorrect words selected. Please try again.
errors.failed: Failed to proceed. Please try again.

mnemonic.title: Recovery Phrase
mnemonic.subtitle: Write down these 12 words in order. Keep them safe!
mnemonic.warning: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone
mnemonic.verifySubtitle: Select the words in the correct order

importWallet.title: Import Wallet
importWallet.subtitle: Import an existing wallet using your recovery phrase or private key
importWallet.recoveryPhrasePlaceholder: Enter your 12 or 24 word recovery phrase
importWallet.separateWords: Separate each word with a space
importWallet.privateKeyPlaceholder: Enter your private key (with or without 0x)
importWallet.warning: Never share your recovery phrase or private key with anyone. We will never ask for it.

errors.required: Please enter your recovery phrase or private key
errors.invalidPrivateKey: Invalid private key. Must be 64 hexadecimal characters.

biometricSetup.title: Enable {{type}}
biometricSetup.subtitle: Use {{type}} to unlock your wallet quickly and securely

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Unlock your wallet instantly without typing your password

moreSecure.title: More Secure
moreSecure.description: Your biometric data never leaves your device

convenient.title: Convenient
convenient.description: No need to remember or type your password each time

biometricSetup.fallbackInfo: You can always use your password as a fallback if biometric authentication fails
biometricSetup.notAvailableMessage: Biometric authentication is not available on this device

errors.enableFailed: Failed to enable biometric authentication. Please try again.
errors.walletCreationFailed: Failed to create wallet. Please try again.

auth.title: Unlock Wallet
auth.subtitle: Enter your PIN to unlock
auth.lockedMessage: Too many attempts. Try again in {{minutes}} minutes

receive.title: Receive Crypto
receive.subtitle: Share this address to receive cryptocurrency
receive.warning: Only send ETH and ERC-20 tokens to this address

transactions.title: Transaction History
transactions.noTransactionsMessage: Your transaction history will appear here

empty.title: No transactions
empty.message: Your transaction history will appear here

transactionPreview.title: Confirm Transaction
transactionPreview.warningNewAddress: First transaction to this address. Please verify it's correct.

securitySettings.title: Security
securitySettings.infoText: Enable PIN and biometrics to protect your wallet from unauthorized access.

empty.title: No conversations
empty.message: Start a new chat to connect with nearby devices

setup.title: Enable Secure Messaging
setup.description: Set up end-to-end encryption to send and receive private messages with your contacts.

bluetoothDisabled.title: Bluetooth Disabled
bluetoothDisabled.message: Please enable Bluetooth to discover nearby devices

empty.title: No devices found
empty.message: Make sure nearby devices have Bluetooth enabled and are discoverable

deviceConnection.pairingLabel: Confirm this code matches on both devices

chatConversation.encryptionNote: Messages are end-to-end encrypted. Only you and the recipient can read them.

addressBook.title: Address Book
addressBook.emptyDescription: Add frequently used addresses for quick access
addressBook.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
addressBook.name: Name
addressBook.label: Label (Optional)
addressBook.duplicateAddress: This address already exists in your address book

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

dappBrowser.title: Browser
dappBrowser.deleteBookmarkConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
dappBrowser.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history?
dappBrowser.noBookmarksMessage: Tap the star icon to add bookmarks
dappBrowser.noHistoryMessage: Your browsing history will appear here

walletConnect.title: WalletConnect
walletConnect.noSessionsMessage: Scan a QR code to connect with DApps
walletConnect.noSessionsDescription: Connect to DApps by scanning their WalletConnect QR code
walletConnect.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect from {{name}}?
walletConnect.disconnectAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect from all DApps?
walletConnect.invalidQRMessage: Please scan a valid WalletConnect QR code
walletConnect.cameraPermissionMessage: Please allow camera access to scan QR codes
walletConnect.scanInstructions: Align QR code within the frame

walletConnectRequest.highRiskWarning: This request may be dangerous. Proceed with caution.

riskReasons.permitSignature: This is a permit signature that can grant token approvals
riskReasons.nftApproval: This grants approval to manage your NFTs

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.gasEstimateFailed: Gas estimation failed - transaction may fail

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.enableDescription: Receive alerts for transactions, price changes, and security events
notifications.permissionMessage: Please enable notifications in your device settings to receive alerts

descriptions.transaction: Sent, received, confirmed, and failed transactions
descriptions.security: New device logins and suspicious activity

notifications.infoText: You can customize which notifications you receive. Security notifications are recommended to keep your wallet safe.

walletConnectErrors.pairingExpired: QR code has expired. Please scan a new one.
walletConnectErrors.pairingFailed: Failed to connect to the DApp
walletConnectErrors.invalidUri: Invalid QR code. Please scan a valid WalletConnect QR code.
walletConnectErrors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
walletConnectErrors.connectionTimeout: Connection timed out. Please check your internet connection.
walletConnectErrors.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

securityWarning.title: Security Warning
securityWarning.message: Never share your recovery phrase or private key with anyone. Store them securely offline.

descriptions.mnemonic: Your 12 or 24 word recovery phrase can be used to restore your wallet in any compatible wallet app.
descriptions.privateKey: Your private key is a unique identifier for this account. It can be used to import this account into other wallets.

warning.title: Security Warning
warning.message: Make sure no one is watching your screen. Anyone with access to this information can steal your funds.

copied.title: Copied
copied.message: Copied to clipboard. Make sure to store it securely.

errors.amountTooLarge: Amount is too large. Please enter a smaller amount.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.insufficientBalance: You do not have enough tokens to complete this swap.
errors.transactionReverted: The swap transaction was reverted. This could be due to insufficient liquidity, price changes, or slippage tolerance.
errors.gasEstimationFailed: Failed to estimate gas for this transaction. The swap may fail.
errors.generic: An error occurred during the swap

empty.title: No NFTs
empty.message: Your NFT collection will appear here

tokenList.title: Tokens
tokenList.noTokensMessage: Your tokens will appear here once you receive some

tokenApproval.title: Token Approvals
tokenApproval.subtitle: Manage your token approvals and revoke unnecessary permissions
tokenApproval.noApprovalsMessage: You have no active token approvals. This is a good thing!
tokenApproval.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke the approval for {{token}} to {{spender}}?
tokenApproval.highRiskWarning: You have {{count}} high-risk approvals that should be reviewed

priceAlert.title: Price Alerts
priceAlert.subtitle: Get notified when prices change
priceAlert.noAlertsMessage: Create alerts to get notified about price changes
priceAlert.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?

hardwareWallet.title: Hardware Wallet
hardwareWallet.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this hardware wallet?
hardwareWallet.verifyAddress: Please verify the address on your device
hardwareWallet.signTransaction: Please confirm the transaction on your device
hardwareWallet.signMessage: Please confirm the message on your device

errors.deviceNotFound: No hardware wallet found. Make sure your device is connected and unlocked.
errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to the hardware wallet. Please try again.
errors.connectionLost: Connection to hardware wallet lost. Please reconnect.
errors.bluetoothDisabled: Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable Bluetooth to connect.
errors.usbNotSupported: USB connection not supported on this device.
errors.deviceLocked: Your hardware wallet is locked. Please unlock it and try again.
errors.wrongApp: Wrong app open on device. Please open the Ethereum app.
errors.appNotOpen: Please open the Ethereum app on your hardware wallet.
errors.userRejected: Action rejected on the hardware wallet.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.signingFailed: Failed to sign. Please try again.

messagingSetup.title: Secure Messaging
messagingSetup.subtitle: Set up end-to-end encrypted messaging to communicate privately with your contacts.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Only you and your recipient can read messages. Not even we can access them.

keys.title: Your Keys, Your Privacy
keys.description: Encryption keys are derived from your wallet and stored securely on your device.

contacts.title: Connect Securely
contacts.description: Exchange keys with contacts via QR code or Bluetooth for maximum security.

errors.noWallet: Please create or import a wallet first.
errors.setupFailed: Failed to set up messaging. Please try again.
errors.shareFailed: Failed to share keys. Please try again.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.subtitle: Your secure messaging is now ready to use.
complete.step1: Find nearby contacts or scan their QR code

createGroup.title: Create Group
createGroup.encryptionNote: All messages in this group will be end-to-end encrypted. Only members can read messages.

errors.membersRequired: Please select at least one member
errors.createFailed: Failed to create group. Please try again.

empty.title: No messages yet
empty.subtitle: Start the conversation with your group

leaveConfirm.title: Leave Group
leaveConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to leave this group? You won't be able to see messages anymore.

errors.leaveFailed: Failed to leave group. Please try again.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Contact
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This will also remove any active encryption sessions.

errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete contact. Please try again.

scanPreKeyBundle.title: Scan QR Code
scanPreKeyBundle.instruction: Point your camera at a contact's QR code to add them
scanPreKeyBundle.info: Scanning a QR code will exchange encryption keys and add the contact to your list.

success.title: Contact Added!
success.message: You can now exchange encrypted messages with {{name}}

errors.invalidQR: Invalid QR code. Please scan a valid Deyond key exchange QR code.

demo.title: Camera Access
demo.message: Camera integration requires expo-camera. In production, point your camera at a contact's QR code.

sharePreKeyBundle.title: Share Your Keys
sharePreKeyBundle.subtitle: Let others scan this code to establish a secure connection with you.
sharePreKeyBundle.step1: Have your contact open their Deyond Wallet
sharePreKeyBundle.step2: They should scan this QR code
sharePreKeyBundle.step3: Once scanned, you can exchange encrypted messages
sharePreKeyBundle.securityNotice: Only share with people you trust. Anyone with this code can initiate encrypted chats with you.

errors.shareFailed: Failed to share. Please try again.
